General.Name: Powerhouse Ventures Ltd
General.Description: Powerhouse Ventures Limited is a venture capital firm specializing in seed/startup, early venture, incubation in growth capital companies. The firm prefers to invest in industrials, health care, information technology, utilities, electrification, decarbonisation, next generation computing, space technologies and healthcare technologies. It prefers to invest in Asia/Pacific region with a focus on New Zealand. Powerhouse Ventures Limited was founded in 2006 and is based in Brisbane, Australia.
